Commercial web(2)
Cloned 'Boostcamp' to responsive.ver

To practice responsive websites and commercial websites, it was developed by referring to the existing websites of 'Boostcamp 2019(boostcamp.connect.or.kr)' and developing them into responsive websites.

반응 형 웹 사이트. 상업용 웹 사이트를 연습하며 기존의 'Boostcamp 2019(boostcamp.connect.or.kr)'웹 사이트를 참고하여 반응형 웹 사이트로 개발했습니다.

HTML CSS
slick.js



https://github.com/Jamin-KK/boostcamp_copy_responsive.ver

Commercial web(3)
Cloned 'Ai Hackathon' to responsive.ver

To practice responsive websites and commercial websites, it was developed by referring to the existing websites of 'Ai Hackathon 2018(campaign.naver.com/aihackathon2018)' and developing them into responsive websites.

반응 형 웹 사이트. 상업용 웹 사이트를 연습하며 기존의 'Ai Hackathon 2018 (campaign.naver.com/aihackathon2018)'웹 사이트를 참고하여 반응형 웹 사이트로 개발했습니다.

HTML CSS JavaScript
slick.js



https://github.com/Jamin-KK/aihackathon2018_copy_responsive.ver

Chosang.art
(Create Artist Chosang's website)

Using 'Wix', I have created a website that shares Artist's activities and Wors.
'Wix'를 사용하여 작가의 활동과 작품을 공유하는 웹 사이트를 만들었습니다.

Wix HTML CSS

PYORANG
(Creative Art Education Group)

Using 'imweb',created a website that shares group activities and blog posts.
'imweb'을 사용하여 그룹 활동과 블로그 게시물을 공유하는 웹 사이트를 만들었습니다.

imWeb HTML CSS

PORTFOLIO 2019
(Personal portfolio website)

Planning a website for sharing portfolios and available animations. Design and Development.
포트폴리오 및 활용가능 애니메이션 공유를 위한 웹사이트를 기획. 디자인 및 제작함.

jquery TweenMax.js scrollbar.js
